tool_description: This API lets you get all the questions beeing asked on search plattforms like google.
title: AskTheWorld

api_list.name: getCountryCode
api_list.description: Gets all Country Codes which you can use to search for a specific country.

api_list.name: getQuestions
api_list.description: Gets Questions Asked by Keyword from Search Engines

api_list.name: getMultipleQuestions
api_list.description: Gets casual questions asked on Search Engine with your keyword.
